entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Saturday 04 March 2023
